headline: 3 Reasons ALGN is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Align Technology’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 23% of its value and falling to $128.81 per share. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
